hero.title: The truth of your stock,
hero.subtitle: Reliable control of every bottle and alerts before you run out of stock. Peace of mind knowing what happens in your business, even when you're not there.

problem.quote: Controlling stock in bars, venues and festivals by intuition is leaving profitability to chance. Reliable control is no longer an option, it's a necessity.

solution.label: VeroStock System
solution.title: Frictionless control
solution.intro: An intelligent system designed not to get in your team's way. Invisible technology that fits into your daily routine to give you certainty, not more work.
solution.invisibleTechDesc: Discrete devices that monitor bottle consumption and bar movement. No cables, no hassle, designed to withstand high-volume pace.
solution.smartAnticipationDesc: Get alerts before stock runs out. Define your own alert rules and manage both bar and warehouse with verifiable information from anywhere.

benefits.title: Your business under control
benefits.reliableDataDesc: Digitise your bar and warehouse inventory. Forget manual discrepancies and end-of-shift guesswork.
benefits.clearVisionDesc: Identify stock leaks and sales patterns with verifiable information. Take charge of your profitability with objective facts.
benefits.certaintyDesc: An intelligent system that learns from your business. Control what happens in your venue without needing to be there in person.

pioneer.title: Pioneer Program
pioneer.intro: We're looking for the first reference venues and festivals to evolve the system together. It's not an aggressive sales pitch, but a collaboration to adapt VeroStock to the real needs of your day-to-day.
pioneer.cta: Talk to us about the program

about.label: Our origin
about.title: We didn't come from an office.
about.titleHighlight: We know what the bar is like.
about.paragraph: We understand Friday night pace and the precision you need on Monday morning. We've lived through closing counts that don't add up and the frustration of watching margin disappear with no explanation.
about.mission: Our mission is for technology to work for you, giving you certainty and giving you back your time. We want you to regain control of your business.

cta.title: TAKE BACK CONTROL OF YOUR BUSINESS
cta.subtitle: Join the evolution of smart stock for bars, venues and festivals. Reliable information for owners who want operational peace of mind.

footer.tagline: the first invisible inventory control solution designed specifically for hospitality.
